channel.title: The Spodcast
channel.description: Your weekly source for quality audio spod!
channel.itunes:author: The Spodcast Crew
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your weekly source for quality audio spod!
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast where we talk about all things spoddy, usually technology related but not always

item.title: Spodcast #31
item.description:

item.title: Spodcast #30
item.description:
• Download the latest episode
    Shownotes for #30...
    • Jared now has an Apple iPhone and Stut is looking forward to seeing how Android affects the market
    • Stut's news
      • SharedServer.net is no more
      • And the other bit of news
    • Sophia Myles
    • TV shows
    • Writers' strike
    • Don't forget to visit and join the Facebook group

item.title: Where be the Spodcast?
item.description:
Haiatus due to some technical issues. They could probably be solved by a sponsor if anyone fancies helping us out financially.

In the meantime we apologise and would like to reassure you that we are doing everything we can to get the Spodcast back on the air.
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast Crew
item.itunes:subtitle: Where be the Spodcast?
item.itunes:summary:

In the meantime we apologise and would like to reassure you that we are doing everything we can to get the Spodcast back on the air.

item.title: Spodcast #16
item.description:
"Anyway, today we have not very many interesting things but lots of interesting things that aren't that interesting".
And Ned.

  • Spodcast forum - including...
    • Skype pronunciation
    • and a poll about what audio format Stut ought to use,
    • but not AAC, for example.
  • The Diamond Rio 64mb is tinier than a quarter of the Spodcasts so far.
  • Guernsey. Small but perfectly formed, much like Summer Glau.
  • Sennheiser headphones
  • Family tech support courtesy of Penny Arcade
  • Sharedserver.net, which hosts the Spodcast
  • Essential kit for deb0rking your family's computers:
    • Grisoft.com AVG
    • Ad-Aware
    • Firefox
    • Quicktime alternative
    • Real alternative
    • Media Player Classic
  • But maybe not iTunes
  • What a rootkit is
  • Stabilizer. What a great thing.
  • Podsafe Music Network. Another great thing. Aren't things great?
  • Portable Sunbird, which apparently bites less than it used to.
  • There was a mention of Subversion, wherein Ned transgressed all boundaries of having a life.
  • CHOON: Cameron Ember - I'm gonna make you happy
  • The Office (the original UK one)
  • The Office (US version)
  • Extras, Ricky G's new series
  • Ricky Gervaise's podcast
  • Top Gear, which should headhunt Tiff Needell back from Fifth Gear
  • The kilohorsepower Bugatti Veyron
  • ...and how it works
  • Francis Fulford - Why America Sucks
  • Summer Glau with a stick up her mimsy
  • Stut's copy of some tATu pr0n pictures
  • Trailer Park Boys.
  • Jared's new MP4 player

item.title: Spodcast #15
item.description:
We had some lag issues during the first half of the show - sorry about that. But listen with hilarity as we sort them out while on air!

  • Stump - Charlton Heston, a reference
  • Top Gear, a TV motoring magazine
  • Doom, a film
  • Uwe Boll, a crap filmmaker
  • Tomb Raider, a crap film
  • Music: Stabilizer - Grey to Green, a song
  • New York, a city
  • Slau, a musician
  • Not from Slough, a town
  • Audio Hijack, an application
  • We Are The World, a terrible song
  • PSP, a portable playstation
  • BBC, a British broadcasting company
  • 23x, a blog
  • Spodcast, the podcast worth listening to
  • Sony Atrac, a joke audio codec
  • Olympus Digital Camera, a recent purchase
  • Olympus Trip, a camera
  • David Bailey, a photographer
  • forum, a forum
  • Asus carbon laptop review, a review
  • Asus carbon laptop, a laptop
  • Ducati, a fast bike (also available in pink)
  • Lamborghini Murcielago, a GT car
  • Four words, a closing statement
